column2: b'Boku dake no Hentai Kanojo Motto\xe2\x99\xa5 The Animation'

b'Schoolboy finds out that his girlfriend has been secretly masturbating in public parks. He decides to help her out and turn that addiction into public sex sessions for the both of them.\n\n(Source: Xanim)'
[b'Boku dake no Hentai Kanojo', b'Boku dake no Hentai Kanojo The Animation']
